text: @NYGovCuomo This national paralysis will continue until leaders ACT: 1. Free proactive mass testing. 2. Comprehensive contact tracing. 3. SELECTIVE isolation. 4. Enhanced transmission prevention. Specifics: https://t.co/a5vJGmbYTT https://t.co/wDrqj6KHNm
